CreateDomain.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: sslpod.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDomain
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Domain": "cloud.tencent.com", 
    "Tags": "123", 
    "IP": "1.1.1.1", 
    "ServerType": 0, 
    "Notice": true, 
    "Port": "443"
}
CreateDomain.title: 通过域名端口添加监控
